alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe, eastern Hendry, northern Broward, southwestern Palm Beach and south central Glades Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Moore Haven to 6 miles east of Big Cypress Seminole Reservation to 9 miles north of Wilderness Waterway. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, South Bay, Chokoloskee, Lake Harbor, Montura, Okeelanta, Loop Road Ee Center, Dade-Collier Training Airport, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Big Cypress National Preserve, Devils Garden, Miccosukee Indian Reservation and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Mainland Monroe
